review.summary: Perfect __init__.py file for actions application commands module. This is a minimal, clean public API module that properly exposes two command classes (CreateActionCommand and ExecuteActionCommand) following the neo-commons feature architecture pattern. The file serves its single purpose well with proper imports and explicit __all__ declaration.

positive_observations.observation: Follows neo-commons __init__.py pattern with comprehensive __all__ list for explicit public API control
Clean, minimal imports - only exposes command classes as intended
Consistent naming convention matching Commands/ directory structure
Single file, single purpose - acts as public interface for command classes
No code smell - minimal, focused file with clear purpose

context.tests: No tests required - this is a pure module interface file
context.documentation: Well documented with module docstring and clear purpose
context.configuration: No configuration needed - simple module interface
